channel.title: Design on Kyle Rassweiler
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Kyle Rassweiler

item.title: Operation Green Thumbs
item.description:
Updated: 2022-04-22

A 3d printed aeroponics tower design setup as four towers with a central pump.

item.title: Banana Breeding Bureau
item.description:
A simple web game built using Godot and Blender.

The goal is to plant banana trees and have unit collect dropped bananas in order to ship them to orbit.

item.title: 2D Avatar
item.description: A 2d avatar made in inkscape for social media.
